channel.title: Dev on Fergus Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Dev on Fergus Taylor

item.title: Google Custom Search
item.description: I’ve created a tool for searching medical resources, here. A while ago I was wondering about creating a tool to help me pool together the different resources I use for both revision, and case portfolios for my University work. I tend to do a lot of background research using a small pool of websites that are well-regarded for the fundamentals. SIGN/NICE guidelines, Clinical Knowledge Summaries, the BNF for example.

item.title: UK Local Elections 2017
item.description: Following a very interesting post I’d found on twitter by Paul Campbell, I was curious to try to recreate the plots involved myself. Plotting a coloured point as a representation of 100 votes in each ward is interesting, it gives a surprising feel for the sense of party proportions in an area. It doesn’t give a sense of voter turnout vs population, but it does give a sense of scale to voting in areas.
